mockQuotes.text: You are not required to set yourself on fire to keep other people warm.
mockQuotes.author: Unknown

mockQuotes.text: Taking care of yourself is not selfish. You can't serve from an empty vessel.
mockQuotes.author: Eleanor Brownn

mockQuotes.text: Your relationship with yourself sets the tone for every other relationship you have.
mockQuotes.author: Robert Holden

mockQuotes.text: Self-care is giving the world the best of you, instead of what's left of you.
mockQuotes.author: Katie Reed

mockQuotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
mockQuotes.author: Buddha

mockQuotes.text: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit.
mockQuotes.author: Ralph Marston

mockQuotes.text: Be yourself. Everyone else is already taken.
mockQuotes.author: Oscar Wilde

mockQuotes.text: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.
mockQuotes.author: Leigh Hunt

mockQuotes.text: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation.
mockQuotes.author: Audre Lorde

mockQuotes.text: You are enough just as you are. Each emotion you feel, everything in your life, everything you do or do not do is enough.
mockQuotes.author: Meghan Markle

mockQuotes.text: Progress, not perfection, is the goal.
mockQuotes.author: Unknown

mockQuotes.text: Your mental health is a priority. Your happiness is essential. Your self-care is a necessity.
mockQuotes.author: Unknown

mockQuotes.text: The most powerful relationship you will ever have is the relationship with yourself.
mockQuotes.author: Steve Maraboli

mockQuotes.text: Nourishing yourself in a way that helps you blossom in the direction you want to go is attainable, and you are worth the effort.
mockQuotes.author: Deborah Day

mockQuotes.text: Self-compassion is simply giving the same kindness to ourselves that we would give to others.
mockQuotes.author: Christopher Germer
